summary.para: Contains classes that implement the main functionality of the Document Viewer control for WinUI.
A control that allows you to preview, print, save, and export a document created with a or a report created with the DevExpress Reporting Suite.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.DocumentViewer.DocumentViewer.Commands

summary.para: Provides access to DocumentViewer commands.

member.value: A set of commands.

member.name: F:DevExpress.WinUI.DocumentViewer.DocumentViewer.CommandsProperty

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.value: A dependency property identifier.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.DocumentViewer.DocumentViewer.CurrentPageIndex

summary.para: Gets or sets the index of the current page. This is a dependency property.

member.value: A zero-based integer value that specifies the active page’s index.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.value: A dependency property identifier.

summary.para: Occurs after the loads a document.

member.value: The document source.

member.param: The exported file’s full path and name.

summary.para: Saves the opened document to the specified file in PRNX format.

member.param: The path to the file where the document is stored.
